author: veithen
msg: SYNAPSE-905: Changed the stock quote sample service so that it uses a single namespace again. Also fixed the samples to be compatible with the changed service and to produce messages that conform to the schema. This change corresponds to solution (2) in the issue description.

author: psharples
msg: Improvements made to the rendering of dynamically added widgets. Before this update, the widgets were missing the styling & menu handlers once they loaded. SEE RAVE-743.

author: harsh
msg: HADOOP-8151. Error handling in snappy decompressor throws invalid exceptions. Contributed by Matt Foley. (harsh)

author: markt
msg: More GC reduction in the AccessLog. Integer.toString(response.getStatus()) was responsible for ~4% of allocated objects under load

author: reto
msg: Created issue branch after finding that it's hard to offert the required slf4j 1.7 as this is not provided by sling Log. A possible solutions would be to switch to pax logging.
But it's hard to see why ldpath need that precise version of slf4j. It wouldn't accept 1.7.1 either, so hoping they?ll make a new release that accepts a broader ranger of slf4j version.
